name: iHomeClean
0:
”Alexa, turn on Eclipse”
”Alexa, turn off Eclipse”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Control iHome Autovac Robot vacuums using voice.

To get started you must first create an iHome Clean account and register your Autovac in the iHome Clean App.

Then, enable iHome Clean skill and sign in with your iHome Clean account to link your robot vacuum with Alexa.

Below you’ll see sample commands to with your iHome Autovac. Use these to start, stop and pause a cleaning. 

The skill works with the following iHome Autovac models: Eclipse, Juno, Nova and Halo.

• "Alexa, turn on Eclipse" 
• "Alexa, turn off Eclipse" 
• "Alexa, start Eclipse" 

*replace the name “Eclipse” with the name of your Autovac series (Nova, Halo, Juno). 

If you have any questions, feel free to contact us by web/email @ ihomeclean.com or by phone @ 877-370-4580
